  • Method Details

    • signIn

      public void signIn(String email, String password, FirebaseCallback<String> callback)
      Signing in a user with email and password. Send uid to callback function if successful.
      Parameters:
      email - Email of the user
      password - Password of the user
      callback - Callback function to call when user is created

    • signUp

      public void signUp(String email, String password, String name, String phone, String photo_id, boolean canOrganize, FirebaseCallback<String> callback)
      Create new user in the database and instantiates a user object with all required attributes.

      Pass null into phone and photo_id if user has decided not to provide that information.

      Parameters:
      email - Email of the user
      password - Password of the user
      name - Name of the user
      phone - Phone number of the user - set null if not provided
      photo_id - Photo id for user profile picture - set null if not provided
      canOrganize - Boolean value indicating whether the user can organize events
      callback - Callback function to call when user is created

    • createNewUser

      public GeneralUser createNewUser(String uid, String name, String email, String phone, String pid, boolean canOrganize)
      Adds a new user to the database and instantiates a user object with all required attributes.

      Pass null into phone and pid if user has decided not to provide that information.

      Parameters:
      uid - user id. is a string provided by firebase auth that can uniquely identify a user
      name - Name of the user
      email - Email of the user
      phone - Phone number of the user - set null if not provided
      pid - Photo id for user profile picture - set null if not provided
      canOrganize - Boolean value indicating whether the user can organize events
      Returns:
      Instantiated GeneralUser object with all required attributes

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(User user)
      Updates a user's information in the database.

      Is the update method for all users in general. canOrganize does NOT get updated here for GeneralUser and will be handled separately in admin related functions

      Parameters:
      user - User object containing all required attributes

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(String uid)
      Deletes a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      uid - string of user id to delete from database

    • getUser

      public void getUser(String uid, FirebaseCallback<GeneralUser> callback)
      Retrieves a user from the database and instantiates an object for them
      Parameters:
      uid - string of user id to search for and retrieve all attributes
      callback - callback function to call when user is retrieved

    • createEvent

      public Event createEvent(String oid, String name, com.google.firebase.Timestamp datetime, String location, String description, int eventSize, String pid)
      Adds a new event to the database and instantiates an object for it.
      Parameters:
      oid - Organizer id of the event
      name - Name of the event
      datetime - Timestamp of the event
      location - Location of the event
      description - Description of the event
      eventSize - Size of the event
      pid - Photo id for event banner
      Returns:
      Instantiated Event object with all required attributes

    • updateEvent

      public void updateEvent(Event event)
      Updates an event's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      event - string of user id to search for and retrieve all attributes

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(String eid)
      Deletes an event from the database.
      Parameters:
      eid - string of user id to search for and retrieve all attributes

    • documentToEvent

      public Event documentToEvent(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot doc)

    • getEvent

      public void getEvent(String eid, FirebaseCallback<Event> callback)
      Retrieves an event from the database and instantiates an object for it.
      Parameters:
      eid - string of user id to search for and retrieve all attributes
      callback - callback function to call when event is retrieved

    • getUserSubcollection

      public void getUserSubcollection(String uid, String subcollection, FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<String>> callback)
      Retrieves a subcollection of an event from the database. Calls the provided callback function when event has been received. Usage: getUserSubcollection(uid, "collection name", new FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<String>>() { 
      
      @Override
      public void onSuccess(ArrayList<String> result) {
          // define what to do with result
      }

      @Override
       public void onFailure(Exception e) {
                 // define what to do on failure case
             }
         );
  }
      Parameters:
      uid - string of user id to search for and retrieve all attributes
      subcollection - string of subcollection to retrieve
      callback - callback function to call when event is retrieved

    • getEventSubcollection

      public void getEventSubcollection(String eid, String subcollection, FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<String>> callback)
      Retrieves a subcollection of an event from the database. Calls the provided callback function when event has been received. 
      
 Usage: getEventSubcollection(eid, "collection name", new FirebaseCallback&lt;ArrayList&lt;String&gt;&gt;() {
      @Override
      public void onSuccess(ArrayList<String> result) {
          // define what to do with result
      }

      @Override
       public void onFailure(Exception e) {
                 // define what to do on failure case
             }
         });
      Parameters:
      eid - string of user id to search for and retrieve all attributes
      subcollection - string of subcollection to retrieve
      callback - callback function to call when event is retrieved

    • userAddStatus

      public void userAddStatus(User user, Event event, String subcollection)
      Adds a user to the requested list for an event in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - User object containing all required attributes
      event - Event object containing all required attributes
      subcollection - string of subcollection to retrieve

    • userRemoveStatus

      public void userRemoveStatus(User user, Event event, String subcollection)
      Removes a user from the requested list for an event in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - User object containing all required attributes
      event - Event object containing all required attributes
      subcollection - string of subcollection to retrieve

    • getEventsQuery

      public void getEventsQuery(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot lastVisible, int numEvents, FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot>> callback)

    • getOrganizedEventsQuery

      public void getOrganizedEventsQuery(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot lastVisible, String uid, int numEvents, FirebaseCallback<ArrayList<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot>> callback)
